mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_locale_stats (full_short_url, date, cnt, province, city, adcode, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{stats.fullShortUrl}, #{stats.date}, #{stats.cnt}, #{stats.province}, #{stats.city}, #{stats.adcode}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = NOW(), cnt = cnt + #{stats.cnt}
